import classes from './MealItem.module.css' import React, { useContext } from 'react' import MealItemForm from './MealItemForm' export default function MealItem(props) { const price = `$ ${props.price.toFixed(2)}` const addToCartHandeler = (amount) => { } return ( <>

  • {props.name}

    {props.description}
    {price}
    • ) }
